conbody.p: This water heater is compatible with the iCOMM™ remote monitoring system. The iCOMM system hardware is purchased separately and allows users to monitor critical water heater operations and diagnose issues by using the manufacture’s water heater app (available for IOS and Android)

The iCOMM system can automatically notify selected personnel via email and or cellular phone text messages if operational problems or user defined Alert conditions occur. The system is expandable to meet the needs of multiple heaters and groups of heaters.
